title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti. 2. While the pasta is cooking, crisp the guanciale. 3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cheese. 4. Drain the pasta and toss with the guanciale, then quickly mix in the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce. 5. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste. 2. Grill the chicken. 3. Sauté onions, add tomatoes and cream to make the sauce. 4. Add the chicken to the sauce and simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a colorful mix of fresh vegetables.
instructions: 1. Chop all vegetables. 2. Heat oil in a wok and sauté garlic and ginger. 3. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. 4. Add soy sauce and serve hot with rice.
